from hetdesrun.component.registration import register
from hetdesrun.datatypes import DataType

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

# ***** DO NOT EDIT LINES BELOW *****
# These lines may be overwritten if component details or inputs/outputs change.
@register(
    inputs={"data": DataType.Any, "filter_series": DataType.Series},
    outputs={"filtered": DataType.Any},
    name="Filter",
    description="Filters data by filter_series",
    category="Basic",
    id="18260aab-bdd6-af5c-cac1-7bafde85188f",
    revision_group_id="18260aab-bdd6-af5c-cac1-7bafde85188f",
    version_tag="1.0.0"
)
def main(*, data, filter_series):
    # entrypoint function for this component
    # ***** DO NOT EDIT LINES ABOVE *****
    # write your function code here.

    filter_bool = filter_series.astype("bool")
    return {"filtered": data[filter_bool.reindex(data.index, fill_value=False)]}
